list.abs: ...之前健康教育的成果化为乌有并引发专家对于产生所谓“超级病毒”（superbugs）的忧虑。
抗生素滥用的另一也是最严重的后果是——导致产生复杂多变的耐药菌（superbugs）。所谓细菌的耐药性，又称为抗药性，一般是指 …

entry.tran: 超级病菌(新闻用语，指无法用抗生素杀死的细菌)
entry.def: Journalists refer to a type of bacteria as a superbug when it is very difficult to deal with because it cannot be killed by antibiotics.

means.word_mean: 1. a strain accidentally imported into Florida from the Middle East then spread to California where it is a very serious pest feeding on almost all vegetable crops and poinsettias
